title: Sexy Halloween Costumes 2015
text:
Expert Videos 
Sexy Halloween costumes put couples in the mood for love. For Halloween 2015, whether you're on the road or stuck having a staycation , make the evening sexy by donning a costume for your lover's eyes only. The following are intended to inspire; available styles may differ slightly. © Buy Costumes. • Sexy Angel Costumes No need to dwell on this dark side this Halloween, especially when you're in love and floating on Cloud 9. If you feel you've earned your wings, this is one of those sexy costumes that will make you feel heavenly. It includes a V-neck dress with silver trim, flowing sleeves, and a lace-up bodice; a pair of wings; and, most importantly, a white halo. Note: Women who wear this costume will be expected to grant certain wishes! More » Buy Costumes. • Sexy Mermaid Costumes This Siren of the Sea costume can turn your world into a water wonderland. It comes with a strapless boned golden corset that laces in the back, a scaly green mermaid skirt (enabling a mermaid to walk on land), and fishtail. More » © Buy Costumes. • Sexy Queen of Hearts Halloween Costumes Short and sexy, this is one of those costumes that practically guarantees you'll get lucky on Halloween. It features a black, white and red mini dress with heart card emblazoned on the full skirt and a ruffled collar to wear around the neck. More » © Buy Costumes. • Sexy Halloween Señorita Costumes A dance... to love! Whoever said a little sexy heel clicking and foot stamping can't lead girls wearing costumes like this to get their Halloween fantasies fulfilled? Outfit includes a black panne velvet gown layered with red satin and black lace ruffles, a sequin headpiece with black lace mantilla veil and a pair of fishnet pantyhose. Just remember: It takes two to tango. More » © Buy Costumes. • Sexy Geisha Girl Halloween Costumes While no one would mistake sexy Halloween costumes that look like this one to be authentic, do you really care? Short and cute, in a turquoise-and-black palette, this sexy and seductive number loosely borrows elements from the East, yielding a black banded miniskirted kimono with dragon accent and an attached train. Chopsticks for her hair, a lace fan and an black obi that's more Obi-Wan Kenobi than genuine obi make her fit to be tied. More » © Buy Costumes. • Sexy Halloween Cave Girl Costumes You won't need to club anyone over the head wearing this sexy Halloween get-up, as your message of primitive desire will be loud and clear. Costumes come with a leopard-print tube dress and faux-suede wrap skirt and tie-up top to layer over it, leg warmers, and a prop club. More » © Buy Costumes. • Sexy Marie Antoinette Halloween Costumes This sexy number is enough to make a Halloween honey lose his head in 2011. Fanciful blue and white brocade costume evokes the spoiled, willful queen. A low, push-up bust adds to the sexy outfit's appeal. Includes a coordinating choker necklace. This is one of those costumes where you may want to also purchase the matching shoes, ski-high wig, and and earrings for the full effect. More » © Buy Costumes. • Sexy Red Riding Hood Halloween Costumes Wolf-bait for sure, this sexy Halloween costume is, like the childhood tale, black, white, and red all over. Short satiny skirt and matching red cape identify a Halloween damsel in distress. Yet the included black fishnet pantyhose will lead those who view these costumes to thinking the wearers are girls who know their way around the woods. More » BuyCostumes.com That's mightly Aphrodite, the goddess of love, coming to you in a short, diaphanous, ruffled toga. Charm her, and you'll feel a thunderbolt of love from the heavens. More » © Buy Costumes. • Sexy Ninja Woman Costumes Her strength and beauty in this costume are legendary -- and so is her sex appeal. This ninja princess girds herself for battle in the war of the sexes wearing a low-cut V-neck jumpsuit with lined shoulder guards and a cherry red waist sash to accent her waist. A face mask and arm and leg wraps are included; expect to be tied up for a while. More » Related Articles
